latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

infractions.Violation Summary: On day of inspection a designated heat/air quality advisory day child care service failed to take measures to maintain children and occupant physical comfort and hydration to minimize potential for the occurrence of heat related illnesses
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting
Fire extinguishers observed not to be inspected or maintained at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Sewage lines observed not maintained at time of inspection Food prep drains observed directly connected to sewer at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Food prep service observed with insufficient refrigerators and/or hot holding equipment at time of inspection

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
